definitions.definition: ( nautical , aircraft ) Alongside or abreast ; opposite the center of the side of the ship or aircraft. [Mid 19 century.]
examples: The island was directly abeam of us.

main_definition: ( nautical , aircraft ) Alongside or abreast ; opposite the center of the side of the ship or aircraft. [Mid 19 century.]

definitions.definition: Beaming , shining ( especially with reference to a person's face or eyes ).

main_definition: Beaming , shining ( especially with reference to a person's face or eyes ).
